mapper.select: select count(ab.abno) cateCnt, ct.ct_bottom cateName from account_book ab inner join category ct on ab.ctno=ct.ctno where ab.mno=#{mno} and ab_inout=1 and ab.ab_date between LAST_DAY(NOW() - interval 1 month) + interval 1 DAY and LAST_DAY(NOW()) group by cateName order by cateCnt desc;
